titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow the casualty loss deduction for disaster losses without regard to the the 10-percent adjusted gross income floor.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S1870)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 2/24/1994--Introduced. Amends the Internal Revenue Code to eliminate the ten percent adjusted gross income threshold for casualty loss deductions.
